column4: any cli one with torify? or any gui one with socks proxy support (if I remember correctly)
can you or anyone else recommend a gui ftp client that uses socks proxy?
http://wiki.noreply.org/noreply/TheOnionRouter/TorifyHOWTO/FTP says compile and run 3proxy to get a local proxy running
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=455868 has some ubuntu specific instructions that may work
